text:
アーマ
私達は来週
家族に会いに
行くの
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 32.66%;top: 10.10%;width: 15.32%;height: 3.46%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
でも今回は
パメラおばさんや
ミッキーおじさんじゃ
ないわ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 58.56%;top: 2.22%;width: 17.66%;height: 2.91%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 4.31%;top: 16.52%;width: 9.89%;height: 3.30%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 53.99%;top: 16.36%;width: 7.34%;height: 2.25%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
あなたのおじいちゃん
日本にいるオサム
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 82.07%;top: 26.54%;width: 15.85%;height: 2.29%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
行く理由を
説明しないと
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 50.48%;top: 37.54%;width: 11.17%;height: 3.61%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 30%;

font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 67.29%;top: 29.89%;width: 11.06%;height: 2.68%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
知ってて通り、あなたと私は
幽霊や悪魔の中でも「妖怪」の類
style: font-size: 14px;color: white;background-color: black;left: 37.50%;top: 56.00%;width: 29.68%;height: 1.40%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

text:
今年のこの時期、妖怪が一同に集い
日本中でパレードするの
style: font-size: 14px;color: white;background-color: black;left: 54.41%;top: 57.56%;width: 26.70%;height: 1.63%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

font-size: 14px;color: white;background-color: black;left: 71.54%;top: 59.19%;width: 26.60%;height: 0.97%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 10%;

text:
と…とにかく
最初にヨリおばさん
に会って
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 48.03%;top: 61.29%;width: 22.55%;height: 2.49%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
皆の所に
案内して
もらうわ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 70.05%;top: 61.80%;width: 23.62%;height: 2.41%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 40%;

text:
でも向こうに行ったら
私やパパの側にいるのよ、
いい?
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 38.78%;top: 76.56%;width: 20.96%;height: 3.58%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
ずっと
離れないで。
何があっても
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 41.76%;top: 79.87%;width: 15.85%;height: 2.76%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
妖怪全員が
友好的と限らないから
パレードで迷子に
ならないでね
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 3.56%;top: 85.11%;width: 17.98%;height: 3.81%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;

text:
何がいるか
分からないわ
style: font-size: 14px;color: black;background-color: white;left: 12.82%;top: 88.46%;width: 19.15%;height: 2.37%;text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: column;align-items: center;justify-content: center;border-radius: 50%;
